Enum SocketProtocolFamily

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<SocketProtocolFamily>
io.netty.channel.socket.SocketProtocolFamily
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SocketProtocolFamily>, ProtocolFamily
public enum SocketProtocolFamily extends Enum<SocketProtocolFamily> implements ProtocolFamily
ProtocolFamily implementation that is used by the different transport implementations.
